alert.note: Alert for Clay; Grant; Kittson; Norman; West Becker; West Marshall; West Otter Tail; West Polk; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 11 at 2:43PM CST until February 12 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM CST SATURDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory blowing snow with visibility down to a quarter mile at times in open country. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 11 AM CST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
